sentences.en: All the organizations involved have sent urgent appeals to the government, asking for extra funding.
sentences.cn: 有关机构都向政府发出紧急呼吁，要求增加拨款。

sentences.en: an appeal to the European Court of Human Rights
sentences.cn: 向欧洲人权法庭提出的上诉

sentences.en: Church and community leaders have appealed for calm.
sentences.cn: 教会和社区领袖都呼吁保持冷静。

sentences.en: Farmers have appealed to the government for help.
sentences.cn: 农场主请求政府帮助。

sentences.en: He was freed on bail pending an appeal.
sentences.cn: 他被取保候审。

sentences.en: His nine-month sentence was overturned by Appeal Court judge Lord Justice Watkins.
sentences.cn: 上诉法院法官沃特金斯撤销了对他作出的9个月徒刑的判决。

sentences.en: His remarks amounted to an indirect appeal for economic aid.
sentences.cn: 他的话相当于拐弯抹角地请求经济援助。

sentences.en: I suspect this book will have the widest appeal of all.
sentences.cn: 我猜想这本书会引起大家最广泛的兴趣。

sentences.en: I threw a mute look of appeal at Paula.
sentences.cn: 我默默地向葆拉投去恳求的目光。

sentences.en: If anything, swimming will appeal to her most strongly.
sentences.cn: 如果说有什么能强烈地吸引她，那就是游泳了。

sentences.en: It may also appeal to the latent chauvinism of many ordinary people.
sentences.cn: 它可能也迎合了许多普通人心中的沙文主义情结。

sentences.en: Johnson's appeal is to people in all walks of life.
sentences.cn: 约翰逊广受各界人士欢迎。

sentences.en: She is not happy with the decision and plans to appeal.
sentences.cn: 她不服判决，打算上诉。

sentences.en: She’s definitely got sex appeal (=  she is sexually attractive  ) .
sentences.cn: 她绝对性感。

sentences.en: The Appeal Court has quashed the convictions of all eleven people.
sentences.cn: 上诉法庭已经撤销对所有11人的判决。

sentences.en: The case is being referred to the Court of Appeal.
sentences.cn: 该案件将移交上诉法院审理。

sentences.en: The defendants, who continue to assert their innocence, are expected to appeal.
sentences.cn: 各被告仍然坚称无辜，预计会提起上诉。

sentences.en: The girl’s family have made a public appeal for help to try and catch her killer.
sentences.cn: 那名遇害女孩的家人吁请公众协助捉拿凶手。

sentences.en: The idea of working abroad really appeals to me.
sentences.cn: 去国外工作的这个想法对我很有吸引力。

sentences.en: The jury agreed with her, but she lost the case on appeal.
sentences.cn: 陪审团同意她的说法，但在上诉时她败诉了。

sentences.en: The programme appeals to young children.
sentences.cn: 这个节目受小孩子喜欢。

sentences.en: The programme has a very wide appeal .
sentences.cn: 这个节目广受欢迎。

sentences.en: The recession is largely blamed for the disappointing response to the appeal.
sentences.cn: 对此呼吁的反应令人失望，主要归咎于经济衰退。

sentences.en: This is not another appeal for famine relief.
sentences.cn: 这不是为赈济饥荒的又一次募捐。

sentences.en: We want to promote cosmetics that appeal across the colour barrier.
sentences.cn: 我们想推销各种肤色的人都喜欢的化妆品。

sentences.en: What is the particular appeal of this island?
sentences.cn: 这个岛的迷人之处在哪里？

words.tran_cn: 吸引人的；动人的；引起兴趣的；恳求似的
上诉地；哀求地；吸引人地
有感染力；吸引人；哀诉；恳求
呼吁，请求；吸引力，感染力；[法]上诉；诉诸裁判

phrases.tran_cn: 引人入胜，有吸引力，有魅力

trans.tran_cn: 呼吁，恳求，募捐，上诉，申诉，吸引力，感染力，打动
trans.tran_en: an urgent request for something important
an urgent request for something important
an urgent request for something important

trans.tran_cn: 呼吁，恳请，上诉，申诉，对…有吸引力，劝说
trans.tran_en: to make a serious public request for help, money, information etc

trans.tran_cn: 呼吁，恳求；有吸引力，有感染力；上诉，申诉；诉诸，诉请
trans.tran_en: to make a serious public request for help, money, information etc
an urgent request for something important

trans.tran_cn: 将…上诉， 将…移交上级法院审理
trans.tran_en: to make a formal request to a court or someone in authority asking for a decision to be changed
